Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class SchoolBoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.PageController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.SchoolBoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SchoolBoardController extends PageController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
SchoolBoardController displays the players's School Boards on GUI

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickname)

    • initialSetUp

      public void initialSetUp(PlayerData[] playersData, boolean expertMode)
      This method is called by setSchoolBoard(PlayerData):
      • It creates the schoolboards calling initialSchoolBoardSetting(AnchorPane, PlayerData, int).
      • It creates the necessary components for the STUDENT_MOVING phase with studentMovingSetUp(AnchorPane)
      • It sets up the components for the characters if expert mode is enabled via characterSetUp(AnchorPane)
      Parameters:
      playersData - the playersData to populate the schoolboards with.
      expertMode - true if expertmode is enabled

    • initialSchoolBoardSetting

      public it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.SchoolBoardController.SchoolBoard initialSchoolBoardSetting(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, PlayerData playerData, int numOfPlayers)
      Creates a SchoolBoard according to the data that has been received by the GUI from the Server
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - the anchorPane which is the parent of every other graphical component
      playerData - the player data from the model
      numOfPlayers - number of players playing
      Returns:
      the SchoolBoard that has been created
      See Also:
      • PlayerData

    • studentMovingSetUp

      public void studentMovingSetUp(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane)
      It creates the island Image on which the students can be dropped on
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - the AnchorPane parent to all the components of the scene

    • characterSetUp

      public void characterSetUp(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane)
      It creates the jesterStudentsPane on which the students from the Jester CharacterCard are displayed.
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - parent to which the jesterStudentPane is added

    • back

      public void back(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Takes the user back to the GameBoard when the "Go to GameBoard" button is clicked
      See Also:
      • ActionEvent

    • setSchoolBoards

      public void setSchoolBoards(PlayerData[] playersData, boolean expertMode)
      It does the setting up of the school boards according to the playersData received as a parameter. It calls initialSetUp(PlayerData[], boolean) and setSchoolBoard(PlayerData)
      Parameters:
      playersData - array containing the playersData from the model
      expertMode - true if expert mode is enabled

    • setSchoolBoard

      public void setSchoolBoard(PlayerData playerData)
      Method displays a schoolboard according to the playerData
      Parameters:
      playerData - the data of the player from the model

    • setCurrPlayer

      public void setCurrPlayer(String nicknameCurrPlayer)

    • disableStudentMoving

      public void disableStudentMoving()
      Disables the ability to drag and drop students to the chamber and to the islands

    • setCharacter

      public void setCharacter(CharacterID character, String player, Map<Clan,Integer> students)
      Method is used to set the SchoolBoards when MINSTREL or JESTER is activated. It enables the ability to click on the students to choose them for the character effect.
      Parameters:
      character - activated character
      player - player who has activated it
      students - the students on the card if the character is JESTER

    • disableCharactersActions

      public void disableCharactersActions()
      Disables all the visual effects related to the characters

    • changeTurnLabel

      public void changeTurnLabel(String message)
      Method sets the text in the turnLabel Label so that the client knows who's turn it is during the STUDENT_MOVING phase
      Parameters:
      message - the message to assign to the turnLabel
